text: 9:30 2 Atriviba 17:13-18; 2 Eghaghaniba 36:15-16Azenir avɨriba nɨ amɨraghatɨgha navibagh iraghasa me mɨgei. Nɨn Duam akar kam isa nɨn akam inigha izir gumazibagh anɨngizɨ, me dar gun gumazamizibav gei. Ezɨ inazir afeziar kaba akam baraghan aghua. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ me isa Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar dafaribagh atɨ.
